tool_description: Analyzes vehicle usage patterns to determine appropriate maintenance intervals based on driving conditions and frequency.
error_messages: Insufficient data: Need at least 2 mileage readings with dates for analysis.
Invalid mileage format: Use format 'date:mileage' for mileage_history entries.
Inconsistent data: Mileage readings show decreasing values which is impossible.
Invalid driving conditions: Use values from [city, highway, stop-and-go, towing, dusty, extreme_weather].
usage: Provide vehicle ID and historical mileage data. Optionally specify driving conditions. The tool analyzes usage patterns to recommend maintenance interval adjustments.

average_monthly_miles.description: Calculated average miles driven per month

usage_category.description: Categorized usage pattern (low, normal, high, severe)

interval_multiplier.description: Recommended multiplier for standard maintenance intervals

analysis_period_months.description: Number of months of data analyzed
